data.text: @LeaningEmma I can understand if the pets get positive… the only thing we can do is before quarantine, find someone to take of the pets
@q_qf98355001 I haven’t come across it. But I’m in a chat with near 500 pet-owners who are concerned.
@LeaningEmma Is it real? I don’t think a city allowing quarantine with pets will do this…

@LeaningEmma Have signed these “Standard” Commitment Forms” that are provided by airlines o at airports if one has foreign travel documents! Have signed a couple outside of Shanghai on arrival but never ask to sign on return. Never noticed the “animal” clause which one do need to be careful!
@sissiwu2 Yeah, cheers and for sure! Not a situation I’m in thankfully, was just sent a “heads-up” by a friend.
@LeaningEmma I suggest that you do not bring your pet with you in quarantine, and would rather have a friend care or foster pet.😅
@LeaningEmma That means that if you take your pet into quarantine, if you test positive for the test，your pet will be “processed”. And You can't pursue that.
